Articles.Content: I was bored, so I decided to try out some unused features in Gimp. What I made isn't that bad, actually.
Very nice! Any chance of getting it without the text? For some reason I'm not a big fan of the text, but this would be a nice addition to my KSP backgrounds

Very nice! Any chance of getting it without the text? For some reason I'm not a big fan of the text, but this would be a nice addition to my KSP backgrounds

As of now, I do! I didn't save the image as a Gimp file, so all the layers were lost. But remaking wasn't too hard, so I just went with that. The image is a slightly different than the original, but I think it'll be fine.
